name: AcroGirls
description:
It's a simple but interesting game which will develop quick reflexes and accuracy but it's very fun too. It's based on a traveling circus's arena and the player must control the trampoline and assist the AcroGirls get from one platform to another.
Game's mode: The feel of the game is very different and amazing because it's made as a silent movie, just like the first movies in 1920's. It’s in black and white and the only sounds you will hear are of a hand cranked camera and of rack time music.
This game has two modes: classic high score, and arcade. Also it consists of 4 different power ups and many other goods for buying in store section.
